label: WorkItem
comment: A specific task or set of tasks to be undertaken.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying an alternative classification for this work item group. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
A comment, expressed as text, for this work item group. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
The code specifying the contractual language for this grouped work item.
The unique identifier for this basic work item. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
The index, expressed as text, to be used for this basic work item.
The index value for this basic work item. Deprecated - Use Basic_ Work Item. Index. Text instead
The unique identifier of a price list item for this basic work item.
A code specifying the primary classification for this work item group. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
A reference file binary object related to this basic work item. Deprecated - Use ASBIE to Binary_ File instead.
The unique identifier of another work item referenced by this basic work item. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
A code specifying a requested action for this basic work item.
A code specifying the status of this basic work item. Deprecated - Use ASBIE to Information_ Status.
The total quantity of this work item group. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
The code specifying the classification of the total quantity for this basic work item. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
A code specifying the type of this work item group. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".

objectProperties.comment: An actual complex description for this basic work item. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
A changed recorded status for this grouped work item.
A grouped work item within this grouped work item.
A specified binary file referenced by this grouped work item.
A subordinate work item for this basic work item. Deprecated - Use Basic_ Work Item. Item. Basic_ Work Item instead
A total calculated price for this work item group. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
An analysis of the total quantity for this basic work item. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".
A unit calculated price for this basic work item. Industry context value changed from "Construction" to "In All Contexts".

referencedBy.comment: A subordinate work item for this basic work item.
